misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami's presence is always felt, and he is known for his calm demeanor on the course, a stark contrast to his fiery competitive spirit.

With six past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Sami is looking to leverage his experience into a strong performance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, consistently achieving respectable results.
While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded Sami so far, his dedication to the sport remains unwavering. Golf enthusiasts admire Sami's tenacity, and he remains a player to watch.
